titleStmt.title: Infants-baptism disproved and believers baptism proved, or, An answer to several arguments propounded in a paper by Mr. Alexander Kellie, minister at Giles Criple Gate London, and sent to Mr. Jeremiah Ives of the said parish and is now published for the general information of all, but particularly for the satisfaction of many of the inhabitants of the said parish who have desired it, wherein the arguments for infant-baptism are examined and disproved by the said Jeremia Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

titleStmt.title: Infants-baptism disproved and believers baptism proved, or, An answer to several arguments propounded in a paper by Mr. Alexander Kellie, minister at Giles Criple Gate London, and sent to Mr. Jeremiah Ives of the said parish and is now published for the general information of all, but particularly for the satisfaction of many of the inhabitants of the said parish who have desired it, wherein the arguments for infant-baptism are examined and disproved by the said Jeremia Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London for Richard Moone and are to be sold at the Seven Stars ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
